SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.conditions

Class LayoutCondition

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model.conditions.LayoutCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition, Serializable
public class LayoutCondition extends Object implements Condition
Condition regarding cards placement on the game field and their color, i.e. the permanent resource on the back of GoldCards and ResourceCards.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • cardsColor

      private final GameResource[][] cardsColor
      Matrix of dimension 4x3, the biggest dimension for a layout condition that can be found on playing cards. Each cell contains the GameResource (corresponding to a color) that needs to be found in that cell, null if the cell can contain anything.

    • maxLayoutRows

      private static final int maxLayoutRows
      Maximum number of rows of a layout.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • maxLayoutColumns

      private static final int maxLayoutColumns
      Maximum number of columns of a layout.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
